title: How software-defined vehicles are revolutionising commercial vehicles —and why you should care
content: For fleet operators, SDVs offer much more than the buzz of innovation. Think of reduced operational costs, improved efficiency, and even new revenue streams. However, making this a reality requires a practical, ROI-driven approach, especially in cost-sensitive regions like India. Over the next decade, SDVs are expected to transition from emerging technologies to standard practices, equipping the commercial vehicle industry with crucial digital connectivity and data-driven capabilities.

title: Rockwell Automation and Microsoft unite to accelerate industrial transformation
content: This shared vision will be showcased through several new releases, to be previewed this week as Microsoft joins Rockwell as an exhibiting sponsor at the Automation Fair, taking place from 18–21 November in Anaheim, California. The partnership uniquely combines Rockwell’s extensive expertise in industrial automation with Microsoft’s cloud and AI capabilities. This collaboration bridges the gap between traditional industrial practices and modern digital applications, creating integrated solutions designed to unlock the full potential of industrial data.

title: Continental to unveil innovative invisible biometrics sensing display at CES 2025
content: Continental will showcase a new display at CES 2025. The display uses cameras and lasers to monitor passenger health and safety. It can detect vital signs and even check if seatbelts are fastened correctly. This technology is hidden within the display and is invisible to the eye. Continental received a CES Innovation Award for this technology.

title: Trump to push self-driving vehicles in boost to Tesla
content: President-elect Donald Trump's transition team is prioritizing a federal framework for fully self-driving vehicles. This move would benefit Tesla CEO Elon Musk, as Tesla heavily invests in self-driving technology. title: Allegro MicroSystems expands R&D facility in Hyderabad, boosting Telangana's semiconductor ecosystem
content: Allegro MicroSystems, a global leader in magnetic sensing and power IC solutions, is setting up an R&D facility in Hyderabad. The facility will create 500 jobs. title: Wipro and Forvia partner to enhance vehicle safety with ADAS

title: Bosch Q2 revenue rises 6.4% to INR 4,394 crore on strong automotive sales
content: Bosch Limited witnessed revenue growth in the second quarter. The company's revenue reached INR 4,394 crores. Sales in passenger cars and off-highway segments drove this growth. The Power Solutions business, a major contributor, grew by 5.7%.  Bosch Limited is optimistic about future growth, anticipating continued demand across segments.

title: Demand for ADAS surges amid growing road safety concerns in India
content: A new survey reveals that Indians are increasingly concerned about road safety. Many Indians have experienced road accidents in recent years. Two-wheeler riders are particularly vulnerable. The survey finds strong support for ADAS, but adoption remains low. Most respondents believe ADAS is crucial for safety and would consider purchasing ADAS-equipped vehicles.
